text.en: Guardians of many beings, the Kulika Dharma-Kings,
Emanation of Mañjughoṣa, Raudracakrin—‘Forceful Bearer of the Wheel’,
I pray to you and invoke you from the region of border wars:
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tamak né né kul

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that the conflicts of this turbulent age may be pacified!
text.en-trans: tamak dü truk zhiwar jingyi lob
